description: Upload and store images to get permanent, stable URLs for use in articles

required_params.name: image_data
required_params.description: Base64 encoded image data or file path

error_codes.UPLOAD_FAILED: The image didn't upload. Want to try again?
error_codes.INVALID_FORMAT: Unsupported image format. Please use PNG, JPEG, or WebP.
error_codes.FILE_TOO_LARGE: Image is too large (max 10MB). Please use a smaller image.
error_codes.STORAGE_QUOTA_EXCEEDED: Image storage quota reached. Please contact support.

usage_notes: Optimize images by default for web performance
Generate descriptive filenames if not provided (e.g., 'gala-hero-2026-02-04.jpg')
Support multiple formats: PNG, JPEG, WebP
Return permanent URL immediately for use in article_crud
URLs should remain stable (don't change over time)
Generate alt text automatically if not provided
